Job Details:
Kibarer Property is seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Architect to lead our architectural design team. The ideal candidate will manage the architectural design process from conception to completion, ensuring all projects adhere to budget, timeline, and the highest quality standards. This role requires a balance of creative vision, technical expertise, and project management skills.

Responsibilities
- Lead and manage the architectural design process from concept to completion, ensuring adherence to budget, timeline, and quality standards.
- Create visualizations, 3D models, and presentation drawings.
- Prepare detailed CAD working drawings and technical specifications for permit documentation and project tender developments.
- Handle multiple projects simultaneously in an organized way.
- Prepare basic cost estimates and assist with value engineering.
- Collaborate with engineers and contractors, as well as managing external architectural teams.
- Oversee site visits and inspections to ensure construction adheres to design and quality standards.
- Stay updated on industry trends with a focus on sustainability and emerging technologies in architecture and design.
- Provide Site Sketches (SK) and manage Change Orders (CO).
- Responsible for delivery and closing of successful projects.

Requirements
- Residing in Bali
- Fluent written and spoken English and Bahasa Indonesia.
- Creative, proactive, deadline-oriented, open-minded, attention to detail, and result-driven.
- Leadership qualities with a collaborative and team-oriented mindset.
- Computer skills expertise: AutoCAD, SketchUp, Rhino, Adobe Photoshop, and MS Office. Autodesk Revit would be a plus

Education and Experience
- Degree in Architecture
- Proven experience in real estate development operations, project management, and team leadership.
- Experience in managing and mentoring
- Minimum 5+ years of experience in professional architecture practice, independent practice, or as in-house architect for a developer firm.
- A strong portfolio showcasing high-end residential, hospitality, and/or luxury villa projects would be a plus.

Please note: Only applications accompanied by a portfolio will be considered.

We offer a competitive salary, a dynamic working environment, and the opportunity to lead projects that redefine industry standards. If you are ready to take your career to the next level, we would love to hear from you.
Skill: Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe Photoshop, AutoCAD, Autodesk 3ds Max, Construction, Enterprise Architecture, IT Integration, Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA), Software Development, and Solution Architecture

Job Details:
About The Job

We’re looking for a Senior 3D Roads Designer (Contract Based) to join our Indonesia team.

When you work for us, you get the chance to join nearly 50,000 people all driven by a common purpose of delivering a more sustainable world. We’re excited about the challenges ahead. We believe there’s never been a more rewarding time to work in the energy, chemical and resources sectors.

As a Senior 3D Roads Designer, you will be responsible to prepare engineering drawings and documentation.

To succeed in this role, you should have at least 5 years’ experience in roads design and drafting.

Who We Are

Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts headquartered in Australia.

Right now, we’re bridging two worlds as we accelerate to more sustainable energy sources, while helping our customers provide the energy, chemicals, and resources that society needs now.

We partner with our customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their portfolio of assets. We solve complex problems by finding integrated data-centric solutions from the first stages of consulting and engineering to installation and commissioning, to the last stages of decommissioning and remediation. Join us and help drive innovation and sustainability in our projects.

What You’ll Do

We are looking for a Senior 3D Roads Designer to join our team in Sulawesi, Indonesia.

The Role Responsibilities Include

 Responsible for safe working practices both personally and in their designs, using the Worley framework.
 Ensure they understand and apply the Worley quality management system.
 Ensure design work conforms to applicable specifications, codes, and standards.
 Ensure checking procedures are adhered to before issue of drawings and documents, to ensure no rework due to errors in design.
 Prepare engineering drawings and documentation.
 Promote interdisciplinary communications on projects.
 Ensure project scope, budgets and schedules for design and drafting work are effectively communicated and met on projects.
 Control the allocation of drafting work to junior designers in the project.
 Mentoring and supervision of junior designers.

What You’ll Have

 Designs for constructability, commissioning, operations, and maintenance.
 5 years plus experience in roads design and drafting.
 Associate Diploma / Diploma of Engineering in the relevant field or equivalent
 Have the experience and skills to set the standard and drive the rest of the team to excel in HSE
 Competent in relevant CAD software
 Excellent communication skills.
 Work as part of a multi-discipline team
 Excellent time management skills and the ability to work autonomously.

Moving forward together

We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection, and innovation.

We’re building a diverse, inclusive, and respectful workplace. Creating a space where everyone feels they belong, can be themselves, and are heard.

And we're not just talking about it; we're doing it. We're reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in today's low carbon energy infrastructure and technology.

Whatever your ambition, there’s a path for you here. And there’s no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change.

Ready to join us? Apply now to submit your CV

Company

Worley

Primary Location

IDN-Sulawesi

Job

Civil

Schedule

Full-time

Employment Type

Employee

Job Level

Experienced

Job Posting

Jul 5, 2024

Unposting Date

Sep 3, 2024

Reporting Manager Title

Study Manager
Skill: 3D Design, 3D Visualization, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Constructability, Engineering Drawings, Health and Safety Executive (HSE), Legal Writing, Representational State Transfer (REST), Rework, and Roads

At Alcon, we are driven by the meaningful work we do to help people see brilliantly. We innovate boldly, champion progress, and act with speed as the global leader in eye care. Configure and customize the LIMS to meet the specific needs of our laboratory.
Develop and maintain user workflows and protocols within the LIMS.
Train laboratory personnel on the use of the LIMS.
Troubleshoot and resolve LIMS related issues.
Manage data import and export processes.
Generate reports and analyze data from the LIMS.

Collaborate with a diverse and talented team in a supportive work environment.

Continuous learning and development opportunities.

Job Details:
Note--Job is based in Saudi Arabia in full-time onsite mode. ( No remote/hybrid)

Position Objective:
We are seeking experienced SAP Functional Consultants to join our team, with a primary focus on leading and managing the implementation and optimization of SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC). The successful candidates will play a crucial role in analyzing business processes and mapping them to SAC solutions, acting as a bridge between the business and technical teams to ensure the effective integration and utilization of SAC applications.

Job Description and Responsibilities:
Business Process Analysis:
Analyze and document business requirements and map them to SAC solutions, ensuring a deep understanding of business needs.
Facilitate workshops with stakeholders to gather detailed requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
System Configuration & Customization:
Configure and customize SAC applications, including data models, stories, dashboards, and planning workflows.
Develop complex calculations, scripts, and data transformations using SAC's modelling capabilities.

Ensure seamless data flow and reporting across platforms.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a holistic approach to analytics.

Training & Support:
Conduct workshops and training sessions to educate end-users on SAC functionalities.

Optimization & Continuous Improvement:

Stay updated with the latest SAC features and best practices.
Compliance & Reporting:

Design and generate complex reports and dashboards for senior management.

Qualifications and Skills:
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, Data Science, or a related field.
SAP Certification in SAP Analytics Cloud, certified by SAP partners.
Additional certifications in data analytics, machine learning, or data science are advantageous.
Min 10+ years of experience as an SAP Functional Consultant with hands-on experience in SAP Analytics Cloud implementation and Group Reporting.
Proven track record of leading and delivering successful SAP Analytics Cloud projects across various industries.
Advanced knowledge of SAP Analytics Cloud configuration.
Proficiency in SAC scripting languages.
Experience with integrating SAC with SAP BW/4HANA, SAP S/4HANA, and other third-party data sources.
Strong understanding of SAC's predictive analytics capabilities.
Familiarity with SAP Data Warehouse Cloud and SAP Business Technology Platform is a plus.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong project management skills.
High attention to detail and a commitment to continuous improvement.
Proficient in English; additional languages are an advantage.

Job Number 24137916

Job Category Rooms & Guest Services Operations

Location JW Marriott Hotel Surabaya, Jalan Embong Malang 85-89, Surabaya, Jawa Timur, Indonesia VIEW ON MAP

Schedule Full-Time

Located Remotely? N

Relocation? N

Position Type Non-Management

Position Summary

Our jobs aren’t just about giving guests a smooth check-in and check-out. Instead, we want to build and experience that is memorable and unique. Our Guest Experience Experts take the initiative to deliver a wide range of services that guide guests through their entire stay. They are empowered to move about their space and do what needs to be done. Whether processing operational needs, addressing guest requests, completing reports, or sharing the highlights of the local area, the Guest Experience Expert makes transactions feel like part of the experience.

No matter what position you are in, there are a few things that are critical to success – creating a safe work place, following company policies and procedures, maintaining confidentiality, protecting company assets, upholding quality standards, and ensuring your uniform, personal appearance, and communications are professional. Guest Experience Experts will be on their feet and moving around (stand, sit, or walk for an extended time) and taking a hands-on approach to work (move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 10 pounds without assistance). Doing all these things well (and other reasonable job duties as requested) is critical for Guest Experience Experts – to get it right for our guests and our business each and every time.

Preferred Qualifications

Education: High school diploma or G.E.D. equivalent.

Other Preference: Be able to speak and write Mandarin fluently

Related Work Experience: No related work experience.

Supervisory Experience: No supervisory experience.

License or Certification: None

Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.

JW Marriott associates are confident, innovative, genuine, intuitive, and carry on the legacy of the brand’s namesake and company founder, J.Willard Marriott. About Versuni:

Versuni designs, manufactures and sells market leading products under the well-known brands Philips, Saeco, Gaggia, Preethi, Philips Walita, L'OR Barista and Senseo. We do this with the simple yet powerful purpose of turning houses into homes.

We are proud of the products we make. As a leading player in domestic appliances, we offer sustainable products across kitchen appliances, coffee, air, garment, and home care. Our company is headquartered in The Netherlands, and has innovation, manufacturing, and commercial centers across the globe, with presence in over 100 countries. We employ 7,000 talented people who bring innovation to our customers.

What we need to achieve this are like-minded individuals who are determined to take their careers to the next level. 

We have been 100% carbon neutral in our operations since 2020, but this is just the start of our plan. We know everything we use today will affect the planet tomorrow. Job Details:
We are looking for a Bahasa Indonesian Speaking Game Presenter with the opportunity to relocate to Romania, a beautiful country in Europe!

Who Will You Work For?
Join a dynamic and leading content provider in the iGaming industry, headquartered in Bucharest, Romania. Our client offers a multi-product portfolio, including Slots, Bingo, and Live Casino, serving a global audience. As they expand their operations, they are building a new team and seeking enthusiastic online dealers to represent their brand. You will have the chance to be the face of various online casino games like Blackjack and Baccarat, bringing a real casino experience to the online world.

Why This Role?
If you enjoy engaging with people, thrive in front of the camera, and want to embark on an exciting international career, this is the perfect opportunity for you. Not only will you be part of a vibrant and innovative team, but you’ll also gain valuable experience in the fast-growing iGaming sector.

Your Key Responsibilities:
Be the Company’s Ambassador: Deliver expert knowledge and top-tier gaming experiences to our players.
Showcase Your Presentation Skills: Present all games with professionalism, ensuring a high level of engagement and entertainment in line with the Company’s expectations.
Engage and Interact: Connect with players, drawing them into the immersive world of live dealer games.
Maintain Excellence: Uphold a strong technical understanding of all games and consistently align with the Company’s brand guidelines.
Adhere to Standards: Ensure all gaming operations comply with current legislation and Company standards, prioritizing efficiency, security, and customer satisfaction.
Contribute to Growth: Actively participate in the Company’s continuous improvement efforts, contributing to its future success and expansion.

Who Are We Looking For?
Language Proficiency: Fluent in both English and Bahasa Indonesian (essential).
Relocation Enthusiast: Ready and willing to relocate to Bucharest, Romania.
Passionate About iGaming: Genuine interest in the iGaming industry with a keen desire to learn and grow.
Energetic Performer: Capable of maintaining high energy levels, especially during games that require lively interaction.
Flexible and Adaptable: Willingness to work in shifts, including nights, weekends, and public holidays, in a dynamic environment.

What’s In It For You?
Competitive Salary: Attractive monthly salary with regular increases.
Performance Bonuses: Rewards for exceptional performance.
Comprehensive Relocation Package: Includes visa assistance, flight tickets, and relocation support.
Accommodation: Company-provided accommodation with utilities covered.
Health Benefits: Best-in-class private health care insurance for your well-being.
Free Meals: Provided daily when you’re working.
Gym Benefit: Access to a gym after your first 6 months.
Professional Development: Paid training to enhance your skills and career growth.
Indonesian Community: Join a growing number of Indonesian colleagues who have already made the move and found a welcoming community within the company. You’ll have the support of fellow Indonesians, making your transition to life in Romania smoother and more enjoyable.
Career Growth: Excellent career growth opportunities within an international tech company, allowing you to expand your horizons and build a successful career.

Why Romania?
Bucharest is a vibrant city known for its rich history, cultural diversity, and welcoming community. This opportunity offers not just a job, but a new chapter in your life, with the chance to experience a new culture and develop your career in the exciting world of iGaming.

Ready to Take the Next Step?
Apply now and become a part of a fast-growing, innovative company that values your skills and offers you the platform to shine on an international stage!
Skill: Continuous Improvement, Customer Retention, Customer Satisfaction, Customer Satisfaction (CSAT), Customer Service, English, Online Casino, Presenter, Public Speaking, and iGaming

Job Details:
We are currently seeking a passionate Automation RPA Developer to join our Human Resources team! The Automation RPA Developer will be responsible for delivering and executing projects and key enhancements required by our internal stakeholders across all departments. This includes the development, configuration, deployment, and support of solutions that our users will rely on for their day-to-day business activities. This role demands effective communication, creative solutions, thorough documentation, and timely delivery. Our primary platform is UiPath, but we are open to candidates with experience in other RPA solutions like Automation Anywhere or Blue Prism and are willing to provide training. If you are enthusiastic about collaborating with key stakeholders to find solutions, develop and deploy bots, and make a positive impact on the lives of our employees, then this role is for you!

Responsibilities:
Analyze, understand, and document business processes in detail to recommend and implement automation solutions.
Participate in meetings or workshops to define, design, and configure automation solutions.
Create and maintain solution documentation, including time saved.
Develop and document test procedures and scenarios for User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
Support internal stakeholders in testing activities, including integration testing, end-to-end (business process) testing, and UAT.
Troubleshoot issues that arise in the day-to-day running of automation processes and provide timely responses and solutions.
Support QA, testing, and audit activities as needed.
Manage the migration of bots from Development to Test and Production environments.
Define and document information security procedures and control techniques for RPA solutions and operations.
Conduct risk assessments of RPA solutions and identify controls to mitigate risks.
Implement appropriate security controls for changes to RPA solutions in alignment with defined change management processes.
Execute security controls in response to incidents that relate to or impact RPA solutions.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related technical field.
5 years of experience with Phyton, UiPath, or related robotic process automation software.
Programming or development experience (Java, C#, or .NET) is a plus.
Scripting knowledge or experience (Python, Perl, VB Script, Shell script, PowerShell, etc.) is a plus.
Knowledge of professional software engineering practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations.
Experience in creating macros.
Ability to understand and create business process workflow diagrams or procedural documentation.
Understanding of Agile Development Methodologies.
Exposure to performance measurement and continuous improvement methodologies.
UiPath Advanced Developer Certification is a significant advantage.
Skill: Acceptance Testing, Computer Science, Macros, Procedural Documentation, Process Automation, Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Test Procedures, UiPath, Work Process Development, and Workflow Diagrams

Job Details:
We are looking for a Technical Business Analyst to join our team. We will work together to design, implement and deliver mission-critical web and mobile applications for our clients. It is imperative that our software applications are designed to be robust, secure and future proof, especially given our portfolio of customers. We would like to tap on your experience, technical knowledge and resourcefulness to deliver world-class solutions for our clients.

Responsibilities
Work as a key member of the project management team to drive the project forward and ensure smooth and successful project delivery.
Collaborate with client stakeholders (IT team and System owners) and internal stakeholders (Project Management, Development and DevOps team).
Work closely with the project’s Solution Architects (both external and internal) to understand technical requirements in the realm of Cloud Architecture, DevSecOps, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD).
Analyze and synthesize business requirements; and build suitable business cases and generate client/business needs through human-centric, visual methods.
Develop user stories, functional/technical specifications and acceptance criteria.
Analyze the impacts of requested changes, and conceptualise and recommend appropriate solutions that continuously address changing business needs.
Conceptualize business processes and present it visually using workflow diagrams and slide decks to effectively communicate complex ideas and concepts.
Analyze technical requirements; factor in dependencies and critical path, and deliver technical deliverables on a timely basis.
Deliverables may include the following:
Architecture Diagrams
Cloud Hosting and Set-up (AWS or Azure cloud)
Technical integrations with 3rd party systems
Performance and Load Testing
Solution Design / Technical Specifications
Data Extraction, Transformation and Migration
User stories/ functional specifications
Workflow diagrams to demonstrate business processes
Manage the project’s technical track, in relation to overall project timeline; plan and prioritize tasks in a constantly changing environment.
Create informative, actionable and repeatable reporting that effectively presents progress and status of different aspects of the project to different stakeholders.
Support the full software development cycle to ensure project readiness for smooth deployment, adoption and operations.
Be open to learning and exploring new technologies, and more importantly, love getting your hands dirty.

Requirements
Degree in Computer Science, Infocomm Technology, Computer Engineering with excellent academic records or outstanding professional or personal achievement.
Minimum 3 years of relevant experience e.g. Software Development, Cloud Architecture, Technical Analyst / System Analyst etc.
Participated in a full software or product development cycle, preferably using Agile Methodology.
Have prior hands-on coding experience.
Excellent analytical, conceptualization and problem-solving skills.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to pitch ideas.
Strong influencing and people management skills.
Ability to understand and translate technical requirements into digital mediums e.g. Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.
Meticulous and detail oriented with excellent documentation skills.
A driven and motivated personality with aptitude for analysis.
Being a pro-active, self-motivated and resourceful team member who can guide and mentor others.
Based in or willing to relocate to Bandung.

The following would be a “plus”
Relevant certifications e.g. Cloud Certificates, Project Management Certificates.
Prior experience in a product development firm or consulting experience (IT consultancy, IT service delivery etc).
Knowledge or experience in one or more of the following areas:
Database designs
Cloud architecture
CI/CD pipelines

Job Details:
About the Role :

As a Sr SDET engineer —you would need to be able to lead and implement the test strategy for manual as well as automation by working closely with the product engineering group. They would also work on the latest cutting-edge internet/software technology. We are looking for passionate individuals who want to make a difference in the world, have a strong will of constant learning and development, are open and collaborative, and never stop striving to improve and develop both themselves and the products they are responsible for. Here at GTF, we want to share our passion in building the best products using amazing technology while having great fun doing it.

What You Will Do

Work closely with the Product team (i.e. PMs, Designers, Developers, and SDET/QA) right from the inception of features
Participate in product & tech discussions, and refine the acceptance criteria and testing estimation
Understand business and product requirements as related to payments and the existing service architecture
Write concise, comprehensive, detailed test plans based on business and product feature requirements; 
Improve the test automation experience by enhancing tools/scripts, test coverage, and/or code structure, and automate repeated manual tasks to improve self/stream's productivity
Take responsibility for the quality of features and the delivery of the entire feature 
Debug and analyze the bugs in the application/service, aiding developers in arriving at the root cause

What You Will Need

At least a minimum 5 years of experience in professional testing in Microservices/API/App/Web
Hands-on in test automation using any language (preferably Java & Kotlin)
Experience with open-source automation libraries like Rest Assured, Appium, and Selenium
Familiarity with CI/CD tools like Gitlab, and Jenkins
Deep knowledge in manual & automation test methodologies and principles; 60+40 (automation + manual)
Excellent analytical, debugging skill and problem solving with attention to detail
Well-versed with Agile methodology, SDLC and STLC

About the Team :

Consumer Payments is part of GoTo’s financial services arm. Our team works to provide responsible and sustainable financial services to our users. We operate with the fundamental belief that financial inclusion can unlock the doors to a better quality of life, both in the present as well as in the long term.

We are responsible for building and growing the customers and payments made through GoPay. GoPay is South East Asia’s fastest-growing consumer payments and financial services app and serves tens of millions of registered users on a variety of payment avenues, providing the most convenient payment methods in South East Asia.

As part of the Consumer Experience team, you will be responsible for products to improve GoPay usage of Gojek and GoPay applications. This team is also responsible for the platform products like communication framework and mobile app experience.
Skill: Appium, Application Programming Interfaces (API), Automation, Debugging, Microservices, Product Requirements, Quality Assurance, Test Automation, Test Methodologies, and Test Planning

Job Details:
Role Description :
 Develop Enterprise Cloud solutions, lead delivery teams in customer workshop, coordinate with multiple partners in client hierarchy to engage, understand and articulate requirements to create solution. Has expertise in one or more Public Cloud provider technologies and is capable of embedding these capabilities into existing or new cloud-based infrastructure and platform solutions.
As a cloud architect, you will engage with clients to define and design the cloud technology architecture and solution architecture. You will also define application and IT Architecture focusing on the mapping of Business requirement’s to IT Capabilities and align the same.

The focus is to define the integrations between, Applications, Data and Technology in the Enterprise and the Transitional Process vital for migration and modernizing to cloud based architecture that includes APIs, microservices and containers.

You will keep yourself updated with the latest technology trends and architectural styles and suggests demonstrating of modern digital technologies to cater to business needs. Recognized as an Expert In their technology and architecture field. You will guide cloud objectives and technologies.
Job Requirements 
 Key Responsibilities :
 Define end to end Enterprise and Cloud based Architecture catering to client needs and requirements Analyse Complex application landscapes, anticipate potential problems and future trends, assess potential solutions, Impacts, and risks to propose cloud roadmap, solution architecture and associated TCO Develop and implement cloud architecture solutions based on AWS, Azure, GCP or IBM Cloud when assigned to work on delivery projects. Analyse client requirements, propose for overall Application modernization, migrations and green field implementations Experience in implementing and deploying a DevOps based, end to end cloud application Lead teams for a discovery and architecture workshop, influence client architects, and IT personnel Guide other architects working with you in the team. Adapt communications and approaches to conclude technical scope discussions with various Partners, resulting in Common Agreements. Deliver an optimized infrastructure services design demonstrating public, private, and hybrid Cloud architectures and services Act as subject matter and implementation authority for the client as related to technical architecture and implementation of proposed solution using Cloud Services Implement Solution using Azure Cloud Services, open source and other 3rd party technologies Create and develop process frameworks, documents, SOP’s, cook book, automation scripts/tools for Cloud Discovery, Migrations, Application modernization, DevSecOps and Services transitions to cloud Experienced in developing Terraform/PowerShell/Cloud Formation/ARM scripts/templates Lead internal and external initiative to standardize, automate and develop driven assets and accelerators
Technical Experience :
Knowledge on crafting IaaS and PaaS cloud solutions in Azure Platform that meet customer needs for scalability, reliability and performance Experienced in delivering large/medium scale enterprise solution using Microservices, APIs, Containerization, Kubernetes, App modernization, Cloud IaaS & PaaS Understanding of WAN, LAN, TCP/IP, VPN, Virtual Networking, Subnet, Routing, Storage account/management and Infrastructure as a Service Experience in crafting systems logical view, network diagram and able to build automated solution for server build, resource supervising Knowledge and experience in delivering solution using middle ware integration technologies using SOA, ESB, API platforms, API Security Experience in design, development and architecture of Java/JEE/.NET based system Have ability to assess multiple types of operating systems (AIX, Linux, Windows etc) and database (Postgres, Sybase, MySQL, MS SQL, NoSQL, DB2, Oracle, Cassandra and MongoDB) to develop transformation approaches and solutions Worked on Cloud Administration tasks :Crafting resource group, storage account, etc
  Professional Attributes : 
Strategic problem solver, have ability grasp new technologies, innovate, develop and further new solutions Experience in driving consulting workshops, crafting content of workshops in short deadlines to C-levels Demonstrate thought leadership, build good impacts in engagements, handle time and demonstrate flexibility by adapting to situations An ability to follow processes Strong documentation skill Good interpersonal skills both written and verbal with the client
Certifications

Job Details:
Wolkk is seeking a skilled SAP Fiori Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and enhancing SAP Fiori applications to improve user experience and drive business processes. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, build, and deploy SAP Fiori solutions that align with business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and customize SAP Fiori applications based on client requirements.
Work closely with SAP functional consultants to understand business processes and translate them into Fiori apps.
Enhance and maintain existing Fiori applications, ensuring optimal performance and usability.
Integrate SAP Fiori apps with other SAP modules such as S/4HANA, SAP Gateway, and SAP Business Suite.
Implement SAPUI5 controls, OData services, and manage backend connectivity.
Design and develop user interfaces that are intuitive, responsive, and aligned with the latest UX/UI standards.
Participate in the full software development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, design, development, testing, and deployment.
Collaborate with the technical and functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues related to SAP Fiori applications.
Stay updated with the latest SAP technologies and best practices in Fiori development.

Must-Have Qualifications:
Proven experience as an SAP Fiori Developer with a strong portfolio of developed applications.
Proficiency in SAPUI5, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other web development technologies.
Strong expertise in JavaScript and TypeScript.
Extensive experience with Node.js.
Proficiency in developing and handling APIs.
Experience with SAP Gateway, OData services, and backend SAP systems.
Familiarity with SAP S/4HANA and other SAP modules.
Strong understanding of user experience (UX) design principles and UI development.
Ability to work independently as well as in a collaborative team environment.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills, both verbal and written.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Nice to Have:
Experience with SAP Cloud Platform (SCP) and SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).
Knowledge of agile development methodologies.
SAP Fiori certification or relevant SAP certifications.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits.
A dynamic and supportive work environment.
Opportunities for professional growth and development.
The chance to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.

Our Values:
Trust and Respect
Thirst for Learning
Agile and Flexible
Quality Driven

Wolkk is an offshore outsourcing company dedicated to connecting international clients with top talent in Indonesia. Our mission is to enable young professionals in Indonesia to learn and grow by working with international clients. We help clients recruit and manage their employees in Indonesia, fostering an environment where talent can thrive and businesses can achieve their goals. Join us at Wolkk and be part of a dynamic team that bridges global opportunities with local expertise.

Job Titles: Lead/Sr Lead, Partner Programs (Bangkok-based, Relocation Provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

 Get to Know our Team: 

One Supply is a team of creative entrepreneurs who design tailored business and product solutions for our partners and help them generate incremental value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek . Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we roll out new products to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and services and deliver significant revenues to the overall business. 

 The Opportunity: 

A Lead/Senior Lead will play an integral part by designing, developing and scaling new programs globally, providing strategic planning support to different markets, ensure programs portfolio growth and performance, as well as work closely with product and tech to develop new features and automate processes.

 Attractive compensations and benefits, amazing offices in heart of Bangkok, relocation support. 
Be part of young and multinational global team in Bangkok HQ (15+ nationalities in Partner Programs team)
Work on various strategic projects from idea stage until global rollout and scaling
 360 visions on supply operations and strategy as you will work with supply, product, performance marketing, partner services, finance, tax and legal, pricing teams 
 Mentorship + various opportunities for advancement throughout the business 

 In this Role, you will gain experience in : 

 Project Management : come up with initiatives to reach business targets, plan milestones and deliverables, allocate tasks, manage stakeholders, measure performance and deliver results impacting business. 
 Go-To-Market Strategy: develop pilot, testing and global rollouts plans for new programs, products and updates. 
 Stakeholder Management : align objectives and deliverables with colleagues in finance, legal, product, marketing and partner services departments. 
 Reporting : Enhance and streamline reports for senior leadership with help of Analytics team and deliver actionable insights. 
 Research and presentations : Present your findings and insights to relevant stakeholders, auditors and senior leadership team on a regular basis. 
 Country coordination: Support local country teams to grow portfolio size of our solutions, help to answer their questions, provide them with actionable insights 
 Kick-start new ideas:  find new opportunities and bring them into action. Based on data you see opportunities and come up with concepts to test and implement them 

 What you’ll Need to Succeed: 

 Minimum 5+ years of experience in top tier consulting firms, international tech companies, fast growing internet / tech startups. 
At least 3-4 years of experience in project management and handling tickets & operations and administrative tasks
Bachelor’s Degree or higher from a top university with a quantitative, finance or engineering degree, advanced business degrees. MBA from a top school is preferred
Ability to communicate fluently in English
Familiarity with SQL, Tableau, advanced Excel skills, advanced PowerPoint and presentation skills
Proven track record in Consulting Projects / Project Management / Business Planning, business or financial analysis
Proven track record in using data analysis, data insights and experimentation to support business decisions
Intellectual curiosity, ability to learn fast
A team player who work well with multiple stakeholders in a multicultural environment

Job Titles: Senior PostgreSQL Developer, Product Support Team (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
Job Details:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

 Our Purpose –  Bridging the World Through Travel 

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

Get to Know our Team:

The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.

The Opportunity:

As a member of the Database Development team, you will engage in database design, data management, and database development, all integrated with automated Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. We work in close coordination with product teams, ensuring to offer support and solutions that uphold technical excellence and fulfill business needs.

In this Role, you’ll get to:

Design efficient, scalable, and maintainable database architectures, schemas and tables
Write optimized PostgreSQL queries, SPs and functions to support various requirements
Conduct database code review to ensure quality, efficiency, and adherence to best practices
Diagnose and resolve performance issues, including queries, indexing and execution plan analysis
Transfer and migrate data from various sources to PostgreSQL, ensuring data integrity and optimizing performance
Collaborate with development teams for seamless database integration
Utilize automated database CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development process
Leverage advanced PostgreSQL features to enhance database performance and reliability

What you’ll Need to Succeed:

Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience with PostgreSQL database development and administration
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering or a related field
Proficient in database design, ER Diagram with advanced knowledge in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions
Demonstrated expertise in query optimization and analyzing execution plans
Ability to prioritize tasks and work under pressure to meet deadlines
Collaborative team player with good interpersonal and communication skills
Be able to attend on-call rotation

It’s Great if you have:

PostgreSQL certification is a plus
Experience with GitLab version control systems and containerization with Docker
Familiarity with Agile development methodologies
Familiarity with NoSQL databases and concepts for handling unstructured data

This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand (Relocation Provided)

Job Titles: Senior Product Manager, Data Science Platform and Data Products
Job Details:
About The Role

You've got an appointment, so you open your Gojek app to order a ride. Behind the scenes, we run numerous data streaming jobs and machine learning models within seconds to provide you and our partners with the best possible experience. However, managing the underlying data engineering and science infrastructure in production is more challenging than it should be. That's where our team comes in. Our promise to business users, data scientists, and data engineers is simple: focus on your core responsibilities while we handle the complex engineering problems.

As a Product Manager, you'll engage with business users, data scientists, data engineers, and other data consumers to identify their needs and translate them into platform capabilities. We solve software engineering problems for data users, and you will be the bridge between these two worlds.

We are seeking an experienced Senior Product Manager to lead the development and growth of our Data Science Platform, including GenAI platforms/products and Streaming/Batching Pipeline products. This role is essential for enabling our data consumers to deliver insights and products efficiently, ensuring seamless data flow across the organization.

What You Will Do

Develop and communicate a clear product vision and roadmap for data science/GenAI platforms/products, and Streaming/Batching Pipeline products.
Lead the end-to-end product development lifecycle from ideation through launch and iteration, aligning product strategies with business objectives and stakeholder needs.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering, data science, analytics, and operations, to deliver high-quality products.
Prioritize features and improvements based on data analysis, user feedback, and business impact.
Utilize data-driven insights to inform product decisions and measure the impact of product features.
Implement and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure product success and drive continuous improvement.
Foster a culture of experimentation and iteration to optimize product performance and user satisfaction.
Communicate product updates, progress, and challenges effectively to stakeholders at all levels of the organization.

What You Will Need

5+ years of product management experience, specializing for at least 3 years in data science platforms, data pipelines, or related products.
Proven track record of successfully managing complex technical products in fast-paced environments.
Strong understanding of data science, and data engineering principles.
Experience with streaming and batching data processing technologies such as Apache Kafka, Spark, Flink, etc will be a big plus.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, leveraging a data-driven approach to decision-making.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
Demonstrated leadership abilities, capable of inspiring and motivating cross-functional teams.

About The Team

The mission of the Gojek Data organization is to elevate user satisfaction, foster trust, and deliver significant value to both our customers and company through advanced data analytics. Our team manages a spectrum of critical technologies including data platforms, data science platforms, data streaming (Daggers, Firehoses), and batching products (Optimus). We also collaborate closely with customer engagement and insights platforms such as Marketing Comms, experimentation, segmentation, and product analytics, all of which play pivotal roles in Gojek’s offerings—from dynamic pricing and driver allocation to food recommendations and fraud prevention.

The Data organization supports all user personas across the entire data lifecycle, from data ingestion through transformation, utilizing analytics and experimentation to extract meaningful insights. Many of our products are open source and accessible on Github, underscoring our commitment to transparency and collaboration.

In addition to driving company growth, we prioritize the personal development and well-being of every team member. We are dedicated to leveraging intelligent technology and innovative engineering approaches to simplify daily life. Furthermore, we share a passion for chai, movies, and TV shows, which contributes to our vibrant team culture.
Skill: Communication, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Data Pipelines, Data Science, Key Performance Indicators, Problem Solving, Product Management, Product Service, Product Strategies, and Product Vision

Job Details:
About The Team

Shopee is the leading e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. We provide easy, secure, and fast online shopping experiences to our buyers and sellers every day.

We’re looking for a mid-senior UI/UX designer to join us in enhancing our core e-commerce platforms.

You will help improve the sellers’ experience in listing products, managing inventory, monitoring shop performance and marketing initiatives, and engaging with buyers through social and engagement features. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams of designers, writers, product managers, operations, and business analysts.

Job Description

Design our core e-commerce platforms (mobile and web/dashboard). Create high-fidelity mockups and prototypes for presentation to stakeholders and higher management.
Work closely with product and business counterparts to understand their requirements and translate them into intuitive user interfaces.
Advocate for our users’ needs by actively participating in team discussions and brainstorming sessions.

Requirements

A degree in Visual Communication Design, Human-Computer Interaction, Computer Science, or a closely related discipline.
At least 4-6 years of experience in UI/UX or Product Design.
A robust UI/UX portfolio that demonstrates your thought process. Experience with B2B interfaces (both mobile and web/dashboard) is highly advantageous.
Proficiency in English is required; the ability to read and communicate in Chinese is a big plus.
Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and excited to drive projects forward.
Confident and assertive in your design decisions while staying open to constructive feedback.
Skill: Communication, Computer Science, Constructive Feedback, Human Computer Interaction, Interfaces, Mockups, Product Design, Product Service, User Experience (UX), and User Interface Design

Job Details:
About EY:

EY, a global leader operating in more than 150 countries delivers unparalleled service in Consulting and assists clients to transform and upskill their capabilities.

We serve our clients to build a better working world, helping them to create long-term value for people and society and build trust in the capital markets. That starts with a culture that believes in giving you the training, opportunities, and creative freedom to make things better. Whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime. And with a commitment to hiring and developing the most passionate people, we work towards our ambition to be the best employer.

At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture, and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

The exceptional EY experience. It’s yours to build.

We look forward you to joining us in the Digital & Emerging Technologies Consultant team:

For UI/UX role, with details below-

Key responsibilities: 

Provide design guideline standard to ensure good UX is achieved across digital products
Provide guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies, testing activities, and predict user behavior
Lead discussion with client to grab their design style preferences
Provide style standards on typography and graphic design based on agreement with client
Involve working and collaborating efficiently to develop and enhance design operations and processes
Ensure design governance and standards are enforced through a design system 
Develop lo-fi/hi-fi mockups and prototypes to effectively articulate interaction designs

Requirements: 

5 years of professional experience as design practitioner
Proven track record of shipping good design experience
Strong desire to change and challenge status quo, ask the right questions and make things happen
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills
Business proficiency in English

Ideally, you must have a:

Bachelor’s Degree or above in Information Systems, Computer Science, Electronics and Communications, or related disciplines.
Minimum three (3) years of experience (for Senior level) and 5 to 7 years for Manager

The opportunity:

You will help our clients navigate the business and technology transformation vision. We’ll look to you to provide our clients with a unique business and technology perspective on how technology can transform and improve their entire organization – starting with key business issues they face. This is a high-growth, high-visibility area with plenty of opportunities to enhance your skill set and build your career. 

Your key responsibilities: 

You’ll spend most of your time working with a wide variety of clients and your colleagues to deliver the latest trends, practices, technologies, and architecture to design, build and maintain scalable and robust solutions that unify, enrich, collaborate and deliver value. 

Skills and attributes for success:

Outstanding team player
High level of motivation
Strong work ethic
Self-starting attitude
Independent and able to manage and prioritize workload
Ability to quickly and positively adapt to change
Excellent written and verbal communication, presentation, client service, and technical writing skills, coupled with excellent executive presence.
Significant experience in managing and delivering medium to large teams on complex programs and projects.
Assessing, designing, architecting, and developing solutions leveraging the latest technologies and trends to exceed the business requirements
Unifying, enriching, and delivering value to derive insights and opportunities
Leveraging in-house and partners - platforms and solutions as needed and recommending and building new platforms/solutions as required to exceed business requirements
Communicating findings, recommendations, and opportunities to improve platforms and solutions

Job Details:
About the Job
At Xendit, we are seeking an experienced FX professional to join our team and drive our foreign exchange operations. This role is a unique opportunity to lead our small FX team, managing several $ billions annually in FX transactions. Your mission is to enhance our FX capabilities, mitigate risks, and optimize financial outcomes, contributing to Xendit's growth and success. You will have a direct impact on our mission by ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of our FX operations, working closely with cross-functional teams, and driving strategic initiatives.

Minimum Qualifications
Extensive experience in FX management with exposure to Asian exotic currencies and global currencies 
Experience in managing multiple currencies across markets and implementing netting strategies to optimize spread
Proven track record of managing large-scale FX transactions and operations
Strong understanding of FX markets, instruments, and regulations
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills
Experience in implementing new fx tools and processes to drive operational improvements 
Exceptional communication and leadership abilities

Preferred Qualifications
Degree in Finance, Business Administration, or a related field
Experience in a fintech or payments company operating across borders 
Knowledge of risk management practices and strategies
Familiarity with emerging technologies and trends in the FX space
Strong network within the financial services industry
Ability to adapt to a fast-paced, dynamic work environment
ACT Qualifications or similar professional certifications

Responsibilities
Lead FX Operations: Manage and oversee Xendit's FX team and dealing activity, ensuring efficient and effective execution of FX transactions
Partnership management: Own the relationship with local and regional liquidity partners to optimize for price and margin and for relationship
Develop Strategies: Create and implement FX strategies to optimize financial outcomes and mitigate risks
Market Analysis: Monitor and analyze FX market trends, identifying opportunities to enhance profitability 
Team Development: Mentor and develop team members, promoting their professional growth and success
Policy Management: Oversee the development and maintenance of FX policies, procedures, and systems
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with other teams to align the FX team with overall business goals
Reporting: Provide regular reports and insights to senior management on FX performance and strategy
Continuous Improvement: Foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence within the FX team
Automation and Efficiency: Work with the product team to automate risk management and funding strategies once proven
Do whatever it takes to make Xendit succeed
Skill: Banking, Cross-border Transactions, FX Operations, Financial Operations, Foreign Exchange (FX) Trading, and Payments

Tada the Game-Changer in Loyalty and Retention!

Who We Are? 
Tada is a B2B2C loyalty and rewards platform that helps businesses improve channel partner, customer, and employee retention, build loyalty, and drive growth. Founded in 2012, Tada offers unified solutions that create engaging and rewarding experiences.

As an Indonesian SaaS company with a global footprint, Tada has assisted 400+ local and international brands across various industries. Our game-changing loyalty solutions have also garnered numerous awards, solidifying our reputation as a leader in the sector.

Job Opportunities
Job Title: Senior Solution Consultant
Department: Product
Working Arrangement: On-site

Information about the role:
A Senior Solution Consultant supports the sales team by conducting demos, answering technical questions, designing solutions, and preparing proposals to align with client needs, ensuring successful deals.

Key Responsibility
Support sales efforts that include bid management, RFP responses, and preparing technical proposals, solution documents, diagrams, product presentations, coordination for pricing proposals, etc.
You will act as the lead contact between prospects to understand business requirements, conduct workshops, analyze requirements, define functional requirements, etc.
Identifies and presents appropriate solutions
Assist the sales team in technically qualifying a prospect
Help client to integrate with our system
Fully understand product capabilities including features and integration.
Do demo to clients
Do project management for the complex project / RFP project (On Premise / On Cloud / SaaS)

Requirement
Minimum 4 years of working experience as Business Analyst / Solution Architect / Presales for software solution/software house with strong experience in bid management and RFP responses.
Having experience handling on-premise software tenders is a must.
PMP certification is an added value.
Bachelor’s degree from top local or overseas universities with min. GPA 3.25
Excellent verbal & and written skills - English and Bahasa Indonesia must.
Stellar communication skills both written and verbal.
Ability to work with aggressive timelines
Possess leadership (CXO level) communication skills and strong understanding of customer needs. 

Why You'll Love Working Here?
Sabbatical Program: Recharge with our 15-day sabbatical leave every three years, acknowledging that long-term work can be demanding
Growth Opportunities: We support your learning and development aspirations, both within and outside our organization, aiming to nurture an entrepreneurial spirit in our team.
Unique Work Environment: Experience the unique blend of a mission-driven digital company with the innovative mindset of a start-up, enriched by our presence since 2012.
Engagement Department: Get involved to refresh your mind with exciting activities outside the work to do.
Laptop Ownership/Allowance: Choose between a company laptop or a laptop
Celebrate With Us: We love to celebrate work anniversaries and birthdays
Learning and lots of it. We promote vertical and lateral movement. It’s not uncommon for Tayo (that’s what we call our team) to move divisions two or three times throughout their career. We want people to learn new stuff that excites them.
Sincere teamwork. This word isn’t officially in our values, but when I asked new joiners about what value they really feel at Tada that’s not stated on our wall, many mentioned that Tayo is really helpful and they can feel the ‘teamwork’ atmosphere
Think and act like an owner is our value. But the truth is we don't want you to act like an owner, we want you to be a real owner. So for our top performers, we'd love to lure you into our stock options program

What We Do Not Promise
We do not promise fixed working hours. Sometimes, projects and deadlines may require additional hours or flexibility.
We do not promise unlimited resources or budgets. We may have to operate with limited resources and manage priorities carefully.
We do not promise a pressure-free environment. There are often high demands and significant expectations for growth and success.

If you're ready for a challenge and eager to make a real impact and be the Leading Loyalty & Rewards Platform in the region, Take the leap and help us shape the future of loyalty and rewards! 🚀🌟
Skill: Invitation to Tender, Requirements Analysis, Skill Development, and Technical Advisory

Job Details:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clientsDate: 20 Aug 2024

Service Line / Portfolios: Enterprise Technology & Performance

Location:

Jakarta, ID

Senior Consultant - SAP ABAP / CPI - ID

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

Work you will do

This role sits within the SAP team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses the SAP Module solutions respectively. As a leader of this group, you will drive the growth of our SAP business in the region and be responsible for the creation, sale and delivery of SAP solutions: Functional and Technical Design, SAP Application & Systems Development, SAP Business Transformation, etc.

 Engage clients in workshops and interviews to analyze process and reporting requirements 
 Advise clients on industry/ cross-industry leading practices. Advise clients on SAP recommended processes and functions 
 Design target state SAP solutions for clients. Influence clients’ thinking in adopting leading/ standard practices while developing target state 
 Analyze application landscape to design interfaces to SAP solution 
 Perform SAP configuration and tests. Develop specifications for development of forms/ reports/ interfaces. 
 Lead the consultant and client teams through the implementation cycle including planning and execution of testing, migration and cutover. 
 Support change management execution by developing training material, delivering training and supporting users post cutover. 
 Develop relationships with internal and external stakeholders 

What We Are Looking For

If you are someone with:

 A good honors Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines. 
 Senior Consultant will require a minimum of 6 years of experience in SAP ABAP Module with some exposure to Cloud Platform Integration (CPI), completed at least an end to end full life cycle of SAP ABAP Module implementations. Also have some team leading experiences would be a plus 
 Has experience in SAP S/4 HANA would be a plus 
 Demonstrated success in multi-cultural work environment. 
 Sound understanding of business process, industry nuances and leading practices in area of focus 
 Ability to facilitate effective workshops to lead target state design. 
 Ability to lead teams 
 Demonstrated excellence in conceiving and executing SAP solution 
 Broad understanding of SAP design. Appreciation of digital enterprise and emerging technologies 
 Sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities. 
 Willingness to work outside of office base and most of all… 
 An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment. 

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified. 

Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles taht you are interested via this official Deloitte website.

Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Indonesia, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.

Job Titles: Salesforce Functional (Senior Associate to Assistant Manager)
Job Details:
About the job
As a Salesforce Functional Consultant, you will be responsible for delivering high-quality Salesforce implementation projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget. You will work closely with clients to understand their business needs and map them to Salesforce's capabilities, guiding them through the digital transformation journey.

What you will do: 
Execute the day-to-day activities of Salesforce implementation for clients, including analyzing and documenting client’s current business processes and governance to identify gaps and potentials improvements
Design and propose Salesforce solutions that meet client requirements, leveraging industry best practices and Salesforce’s latest features. Ensure that the solutions are scalable, maintainable, and aligned with the overall IT strategy. 
Prepare the functional specification design and bridge the requirement from business to technical team to be developed. Collaborate very closely with technical team to deliver the features required for the client.
Assist in the preparation of deliverables, client presentations and data gathering sessions by contributing to the design, preparation, and analysis of reports and findings in a clear, logical, and concise manner
Co-ordinate and work with other consultants' peers on the proposal and lead the required presentation.
Maintain client relationship.
Continuously self-upgrade yourself with the latest Salesforce roadmap, technology, and certification.

Desired Skills & Experience:
At least 3 years of experience in delivering Salesforce implementation projects and managing a team of consultants. Experience with Sales Cloud is essential, and experience with other Salesforce products (e.g., Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud) is a plus.
Have Salesforce.com certifications.
Educational background in related field.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills especially in needs analysis, positioning, and business justification.
Strong problem solving, analytical and independent judgment skills to support an environment driven by customer service and teamwork.
Proficient in managing projects involving cross-border, multi-function and complex stakeholders.
Intellectual mobility, inquisitiveness and an ability to work independently; be comfortable developing answers and solutions often when the client requirement remains unclear, or changes.
High proficiency in both verbal and written English is essential.
Flexibility to adapt to a variety of different engagement types, working hours and work environments and locations.


Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted by KPMG Siddharta Advisory Recruitment team. All applicants' information and personal data will be treated as strictly confidential and used for recruitment purposes only.
Skill: English, IT Strategy, SAP Marketing Cloud, Salesforce Sales Cloud, and Salesforce.com

Job Titles: Tencent Cloud IaaS Product Solution Architect
Job Details:
Responsibilities:

About The Company

Tencent is a leading global technology company focused on connecting people and developing innovative products and services that improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 and publicly traded on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange since 2004, Tencent offers a variety of products and services, including leading communication and social platforms (Weixin/WeChat), high-quality entertainment (from video games, music, TV and film, sport and literature), FinTech (WeChat Pay and QQ Wallet) and industry-leading cloud products and services.

Cloud & Smart Industries Group (CSIG) is responsible for promoting the company's cloud and industry Internet strategy. CSIG explores the interactions between users and industries to create innovative solutions for smart industries via technological advancements such as cloud, AI, and network security. While driving the digitalization of retail, medical, education, transportation and other industries, CSIG helps companies serve users in smarter ways, building a new ecosystem of intelligent industries that connect users and businesses.

Position Overview:

Are you passionate about shaping the future of cloud infrastructure? Join Tencent Cloud as an IaaS Product Architect and play a pivotal role in providing technical expertise and support for our industry-leading IaaS/PaaS products. In this role, you'll collaborate closely with our sales and technical teams to work with our industry clients, offering professional technical guidance, understanding their needs, and designing robust technical solutions. With a broad technical vision, you'll integrate various products and partners to build ecosystem capabilities, deliver tailored solutions, and drive rapid product development. You'll also lead project implementation, handle customer requirements, provide feedback for product enhancement, and contribute to continuous solution refinement and dissemination.

Responsibilities:

Prepare, execute, oversee technical proof-of-concept and its activities
Create winning proposals with comprehensive statements of work
Work closely with Clients and Sales Team to understand their business needs
Work with field teams to develop feasible working solutions and scope
Conduct technical presentations, webinars, and workshops. 

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science or its equivalents. Relevant cloud certifications at professional level will be highly advantageous. 
Minimum 5 years of cloud pre-sales architecture experience with a strong focus on IaaS and PaaS products
Scripting skill such as Python, Bash or Powershell is a plus
Broad technical knowledge across multiple technological domains, including Linux & Windows Server OS, web service stack, networking, Migration, data storage, containerization, DevOps. 
Excellent communications and writing skills in both English and the local language. 

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion at Tencent

Diversity, equity and inclusion are important, interdependent components of our workplace. As an equal opportunity employer, we firmly believe that diverse voices fuel our innovation and allow us to better serve our users and the community. We foster an environment where every employee of Tencent feels supported and inspired to achieve individual and common goals.
Skill: Architecture, Azure Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Cloud Computing, Communication, Computer Science, Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Presales, Statements of Work (SOW), Technical Presentations, and Web Conferencing

 Are you ready to unleash your potential?

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

 Work you will do 

Deloitte Government & Public Services is committed to improving public outcomes through a focus on people. At Deloitte we think about the complex issues facing the public sector and develop relevant, timely, and sustainable solutions for our clients.

This role sits within the Systems Engineering team of Deloitte Southeast Asia and delivers large-scale software applications and integrated systems, and assists clients with architecture design, assessment and optimization, and definition.

You’ll work alongside our clients to help them achieve success in developing a service-oriented architecture (SOA) with reference to the following areas:

 Assist clients in managing the complexity inherent with technology change, from requirements planning to architecture, testing to deployment, and beyond, helping to link their IT programs to organisational goals. 
 Create a strategy for how their organisations can exploit the Cloud, create a business case, design a Cloud architecture and put in place governance and policies to manage the new world. 
 Architect the migration approach. Think about which of their existing on-premise applications to migrate to the Cloud, which applications should be re-built using Cloud native technologies and which should be bought from Cloud SaaS providers. 
 Re-imagine ways of working. Engage the entire businesses to re-imagine the way work gets done and how new products and services are brought to market, all enabled by Cloud technologies. Engage with the business to re-imagine integration solutions to enable information sharing and management between business units, disparate processes & systems. 
 Innovate in delivery. Embrace new agile ways of working, enabled by new Cloud tools, to deliver your Cloud solutions. 
 Integrate. Consider how to integrate the Cloud into their enterprise through infrastructure and networking solutions to connect, optimise, and manage Cloud solutions across a wide choice of platforms. 
 Managed services. Ensure their use of the Cloud is secure, resilient, compliant, cost effective, and properly service managed, consider the use of a Cloud Managed Service Provider. 

 Your role as a leader 

At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people and the communities.  Build deep professional relationships across a diverse network and use a flexible influencing style to gain buy-in and drive impact. 
 Translate broader strategy into a compelling team vision and goals as well as align the team and sets priorities to achieve objectives. 
 Contribute to building an inclusive talent pipeline by creating a talent experience that attracts, develops and retains diverse, top talent and high performing teams. 

About

 Enough about us, let's talk about you

 Tertiary qualification in a computer Science or information systems disciple with a well ranked institution and/or currently enrolled in a MBA program. 
 Minimum 10 years of professional experience in technology transformation with leading management consulting firms. 
 Strong experience directly interfacing with senior business and IT stakeholders for public sector clients.
